/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -o3 -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/direct_sparse.dir/direct_sparse.cpp.o  -o direct_sparse  -L/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64 -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudabgsegm.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudaobjdetect.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudastereo.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_dnn.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_shape.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_stitching.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_superres.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videostab.so.3.4.0 -lg2o_core -lg2o_types_sba -lg2o_solver_csparse -lg2o_stuff -lg2o_csparse_extension /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudafeatures2d.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudacodec.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudaoptflow.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudalegacy.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudawarping.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_photo.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudaimgproc.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudafilters.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudaarithm.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_video.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.3.4.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudev.so.3.4.0 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64:/usr/local/lib
